price: 10.Nummah Nabiyow kok duma warrayte ummattak koros kok duma Rubsumte farmoytiitil anqasseh, tokkel keenik koroosite maray Yallih farmoytiitil anqase Yallih digaalay elle anqasak mamut как Angadduk Sugeeni keenil obteeh maro keenit hayte.
arabic: وَلَقَدِ ٱسۡتُهۡزِئَ بِرُسُلٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ فَحَاقَ بِٱلَّذِينَ سَخِرُواْ مِنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqadi us'tuh'zi-a birusulin min qablika faḥāqa bi-alladhīna sakhirū min'hum mā kānū bihi yastahziūna
